channel.title: CVE Feed for ServiceNow -- ServiceNow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ServiceNow -- ServiceNow

item.title: CVE-2022-46886|2024-08-03T14:39:38.636Z -- servicenow -- servicenow
item.description: There exists an open redirect within the response list update functionality of ServiceNow. This allows attackers to redirect users to arbitrary domains when clicking on a URL within a service-now domain.
